title: Čornobiļa 2022. Iebrukums
overview: Latvian-Ukrainian co-production series based on the events discussed in the documentary "Chernobyl 2022" – three young friends go on an extreme trip to the closed zone of Chernobyl, shortly before the Russian invasion. The main character Santa acts at the centre of the series. She goes to the Chernobyl zone for a video blog and meeting here recently on Tinder met love.
